snippet: Video of a conservative prankster being punched in the face in Michigan was edited to remove footage showing that the man who threw the punch had been knocked to the ground moments earlier.
abstract: Video of a conservative prankster being punched in the face in Michigan was edited to remove footage showing that the man who threw the punch had been knocked to the ground moments earlier.

headline.main: Selective Editing by Fox News Contributor Revealed by Fox News
